hanzi-su-wiki:
報

Значения

Отплачивать, благодарить; мстить; сообщать, информировать.

Мнемоника

Иметь полномочия (рука 又 с биркой 卩) на слежку за преступником 幸. Донос, сообщение. Вознаграждение (доносчика). Газета — информирование о том, что делается в стране.

Варианты

报

heisig_chinese_memo: When the fashion model (stamp over his crotch) got happy, of course, it ended up in the newspaper.  A good fortune for many people.
heisig_constituent: report, happiness, ten, needle, stand up, vase, underpants, stamp, crotch, ten2, needle2
koohiiStory1: Recall the fashion model wearing just a stamp over his crotch (clothing (#1399)). When he got happy, of course, it ended up in the news report.
koohiiStory2: The long awaited report, 'Maximising Male Happiness In The Workplace' concluded that making bikinis, with only a stamp sized piece of cloth covering the crotch, compulsory for attractive female staff, was the most cost-effective means of achieving this aim.
jp_example_words:
報酬(ほうしゅう): remuneration, recompense, reward, toll
報じる(ほうじる): to inform, to report
報ずる(ほうずる): to inform, to report
報道(ほうどう): information, report
情報(じょうほう): information, news, (military) intelligence, gossip
報告(ほうこく): report, information
予報(よほう): forecast, prediction
天気予報(てんきよほう): weather forecast
電報(でんぽう): telegram
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You want to share happiness with people so you stamp stools with the news. Now when people want a report of all the happy things going on, they can just look down before they sit.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Stand up and look at the happy news today! It definitely isn't sad or depressing.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You research and report the news from home (ほう). Only after, once all of the news is stamped onto the stools, do you leave your home.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Because your reporting is done from home, most of the news is about how your plants are growing. What the cat did this morning. And it certainly isn't the news without the weather!

Ru_trainchinese:
bào: (сущ) газета, пресса; отчет, сводка; телеграмма
bào: (глаг) сообщать, докладывать; отвечать; отплатить, отблагодарить; отомстить
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you've got happiness (幸) sealed up again (𠬝) your report is well compensated
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Recall the fashion model wearing just a stamp over his crotch.  When he got happy he tried to cover it with his fingers, but of course it ended up in the newspaper.
humanum_full_description_en:
The " fortunate " on the left of the newspaper today is an error of "㚔". " Newspaper " A word, the same as gold, Zhuanwen configuration, all from㚔from 𠬝, kneeling like a word ( " Jie sinner"), and was from the rear hand ( " and ") uniforms, wear it Handcuffs ("㚔"). The original meaning of " retribution " is to punish and plead guilty, and the extension is retribution. "Shu Wen": "Report, be a sinner. From 㚔 from 𠬝. 𠬝, plead guilty." From this point of view, the original meaning of the word "report" refers to the "punishment" or "retribution" after the crime, such as "Shang Shu. Zhou Shu. Lu Xing: "Report abuse with prestige." As for the later general meanings of "return" and "repay" are all extended usages, such as the six-year-old Yan Shenggui: "The Bai (Bo) family repays the Bi Yansheng." "The Book of Songs. Guofeng. Weifeng. Papaya." ："Repay with Qiong Yao", or "The Book of Songs. Xiaoya. Gu Fengzhishi. Polygonum": "The virtue of wishing to repay is the extreme of the sky."

From the shape of view, " reported that " training can also be interpreted as " executive ", in addition to Yan Yiping, Maru Sen interpreted as " newspaper ", the majority of scholars interpretation of this word as " executive " or " loved ."
humanum_short_description_en: The word " report " is changed from "㚔" (梏, the instrument of detention) from " 𠬝 ", which means that the criminal is handcuffed. The original meaning is to punish and plead guilty, and it is extended to retribution.
humanum_full_description:
報字今日左邊的「幸」乃「㚔」的訛寫。「報」字的甲、金、篆文構形相同，皆從㚔從𠬝，字象一跪坐（「卩」）的罪人，被人自後方以手（「又」）制服，使其戴上手銬（「㚔」）。「報」的本義是懲治、服罪，引申為報應。《說文》：「報，當罪人也。从㚔从𠬝。𠬝，服罪也。」由此看，報字的原初意義是指犯罪之後的「懲治」或「報應」解，如《尚書 .周書.呂刑》：「報虐以威」。至於後來一般意義的「回報」、「報答」等都是引申的用法，如六年琱生簋：「白(伯)氏則報璧琱生。」《詩經.國風.衛風.木瓜》：「報之以瓊瑤」，或《詩經.小雅.谷風之什.蓼莪》：「欲報之德，昊天罔極。」

　　從字形上看，「報」亦可訓釋為「執」，除了嚴一萍、馬如森釋為「報」外，大部分學者釋此字為「執」或「摯」。
humanum_short_description: 「報」字從「㚔」（梏，拘押的刑具）從「𠬝」，表示銬押罪人，本義是懲治、服罪，引申為報應。

报报 		report, tell, announce, reward, retribution
  • wrapped 𠬝 fortune 幸

(Simplified: 报)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A hand 幸 cuffing 又 a criminal 卩, representing sentencing
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 幸 [ xìng ] favor, fortune, luck; surname
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • 卩 [ jié ] seal; kneeling person
      • 又 [ yòu ] and, also, again, in addition
①傳達，告知：報告。報喜。報捷。報考。報請(用書面報告向上級請示)。報廢。
②傳達消息和言論的文件、信號或出版物：簡報(文字較短、內容簡略的書面報告，印發給有關部門)。電報。情報。晚報。畫報。報端。
③回答：報答。報恩。報仇。報國(報效祖國)。報酬。
④由於做了壞事而受到懲罰：報應。

報字今日左邊的「 幸 」乃「 㚔 」的訛寫。「 報 」字的甲、金、篆文構形相同，皆從㚔從𠬝，字象一跪坐（「 卩 」）的罪人，被人自後方以手（「 又 」）制服，使其戴上手銬（「 㚔 」）。「 報 」的本義是懲治、服罪，引申為報應。《說文》：「報，當罪人也。从㚔从𠬝。𠬝，服罪也。」由此看，報字的原初意義是指犯罪之後的「懲治」或「報應」解，如《尚書 .周書.呂刑》：「報虐以威」。至於後來一般意義的「回報」、「報答」等都是引申的用法，如六年琱生簋：「白(伯)氏則報璧琱生。」《詩經.國風.衛風.木瓜》：「報之以瓊瑤」，或《詩經.小雅.谷風之什.蓼莪》：「欲報之德，昊天罔極。」 從字形上看，「 報 」亦可訓釋為「 執 」，除了嚴一萍、馬如森釋為「 報 」外，大部分學者釋此字為「 執 」或「 摯 」。

The original meaning of " retribution" is to punish and plead guilty, and the extension is retribution. "Shu Wen": "Report, be a sinner. From 㚔 from 𠬝. 𠬝, plead guilty." From this point of view, the original meaning of the word "report" refers to the "punishment" or "retribution" after the crime, such as "Shang Shu. Zhou Shu. Lu Xing: "Report abuse with prestige." As for the later general meanings of "return" and "repay" are all extended usages, such as the six-year-old Yan Shenggui: "The Bai (Bo) family repays the Bi Yansheng." "The Book of Songs. Guofeng. Weifeng. Papaya." ："Repay with Qiong Yao", or "The Book of Songs. Xiaoya. Gu Fengzhishi. Polygonum": "The virtue of wishing to repay is the extreme of the sky." From the shape of view, " reported that" training can also be interpreted as " executive", in addition to Yan Yiping, Maru Sen interpreted as " newspaper", the majority of scholars interpretation of this word as " executive" or " loved."

報字的基本解释

報
bào
见“报”。

報字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bào］
［《廣韻》博耗切，去号，幫。］
“报1”的繁体字。
(1)根据犯罪者罪行的轻重大小，依法判处相应的刑罚。
(2)符合。
(3)反复；往复。
(4)祭祀。
(5)回赠，回报。
(6)报效；报答。
(7)报复。
(8)犹言报应；果报。
(9)复命。奉命办事完毕，回来报告。
(10)泛称报告；告知。
(11)指小辈通于比其辈分高的人。后视为乱伦。
(12)复信。
(13)泛指书信。
(14)特指皇帝对臣下所上条陈、奏章等的批复。
(15)指传达某种消息的书面通知单。
(16)报纸。
[②]［fù］
［《集韻》芳遇切，去遇，敷。］
“报2”的繁体字。通“赴1”。
(1)急速。
(2)往，去。

報字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　報； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页234第05
【唐韻】博耗切【集韻】【韻會】博號切，?保去聲。復也，酬也，答也。【詩·鄭風】投我以木瓜，報之以瓊琚。【禮·郊特牲】報本反始。【註】謝其恩之謂報，歸其功之謂反。【史記·范睢傳】睚睚之怨必報。　又告也。【前漢·吳王傳】無文書，口報。【天寶遺事】新進士及第，以泥金書帖子，附家書中，用報登科之喜。　又猶合也。【禮·喪服小記】下殤小功帶澡麻，不絕本，詘而反以報之。　又論囚曰報。【前漢·張湯傳】爰書論訊鞫報。　又下婬上曰報。【左傳·宣三年】鄭文公報鄭子之妃曰?嬀。【註】鄭子，文公叔父子儀也。【漢律】婬季父之妻曰報。　又與赴通。【禮·喪服小記】報葬者報虞。【註】報，讀爲赴，急疾之義。虞以安神，不可緩也。　本作?。

報字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
報字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bào］
["Guang Yun" Bo consumption cut, go to the number, help. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "报1".
(1) According to the severity of the offender’s crimes, corresponding penalties shall be imposed in accordance with the law.
(2) Meet.
(3) Repeat; reciprocating.
(4) Sacrifice.
(5) Rebate, return.
(6) Repay; repay.
(7) Retaliation.
(8) Still retribution; retribution.
(9) Return to life. I have been ordered to finish the work and come back to report.
(10) General term report; inform.
(11) Refers to a person whose junior level is higher than their seniority. Later regarded as incest.
(12) Reply.
(13) Refers to correspondence in general.
(14) Specifically refers to the emperor's approval of Shang Tiao Chen, memorials and so on.
(15) Refers to a written notice that conveys certain information.
(16) Newspaper.
[②]［fù］
["Ji Yun" Fang Yuqie, go to meet, apply. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "报2". Same as "Go to 1".
(1) Hurry.
(2) Go, go.

[Ritual·Mourning Apparel Notes] The burial reporter reports Yu. [Note] Newspaper, read as going, the meaning of emergency. Yu Yi calms the nerves and cannot be delayed.　This work?.

Report
Name meaning
Nothing.
bào, fù
вм. 报
Radicals: 幸, 卩, 又  (happiness, stamp, stool)
Meaning Mnemonic
You want to share happiness with people so you stamp stools with the news. Now when people want a report of all the happy things going on, they can just look down before they sit.
Stand up and look at the happy news today! It definitely isn't sad or depressing.
Reading Mnemonic
You research and report the news from home (ほう). Only after, once all of the news is stamped onto the stools, do you leave your home.
Because your reporting is done from home, most of the news is about how your plants are growing. What the cat did this morning. And it certainly isn't the news without the weather!
